name: handle-geo-event
description: Queues custom geolocation events sent from devices such as iPhones.
author: Tim Malone <tdmalone@gmail.com>

scripts.test: yarn test-visit-exit && yarn test-form-data && yarn test-location-update
scripts._test: docker run --name lambda --rm -e SNS_QUEUE -e AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID -e AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY -v "${PWD}":/var/task lambci/lambda:nodejs6.10 index.handler
